strapiPost.title: Hop to It! Your Easter Weekend Guide in NWA
strapiPost.content:
Easter is already upon us, and NWA is blooming - whether you're hiding eggs or headed to brunch, here is what we will be doing this weekend:

Fayetteville

  • Ella's Table is hosting an Easter Brunch on Sunday, April 4th from 11am to 4pm.
  • Atlas the Restaurant will be featuring a four course tasting menu on Sunday, April 4th.
  • The Razorback Football team will be hosting the second scrimmage of the spring at Razorback Stadium, open to all fans.
  • Experience Fayetteville will have their Outdoor Recreation Area pop-up lounge tonight and all day tomorrow.

Bentonville

  • Bentonville's 5th Annual Community Easter Egg Hunt will take place on 4/3, starting at 10:30am.
  • Tavola Trattoria is offering takeout specials all Easter weekend Friday to Sunday.
  • The Hub Bike Lounge is hosting a party this weekend to launch its new Dirt Surfer IPA and to giveaway a MTB!
  • Peel Compton is hosting a native tree and plant sale tomorrow.

Rogers

  • Mirabella's Table has a full Easter dinner menu available Friday, April 2nd and Saturday, April 3rd.
  • Cave Springs market will be hosting a family friendly easter egg hunt tomorrow.

Springdale

  • Infiniti Athletics in Springdale will be hosting an Easter Egg Glow in the Dark Hunt today, 4/2, starting at 6:30pm.
  • Springdale's Shaw Park is also set to open this weekend.

Easter Weekend Specials

  • Kindness & Joy Toys will have custom and personalized Easter baskets for kids of all ages and plenty of items to put in your existing Easter baskets.
  • Zuzu's Petals and Gifts is offering special flowers for Easter and custom Easter baskets ready for you or build-your-own baskets!
  • Bake It Til You Make It NWA has custom Easter cookies available.
  • Neighbor's Mill Bakery & Cafe is offering Easter Cakes and Hot Cross buns along with Easter cookies, DIY Easter kits and Easter Boxes.
